meanings.definition: The quality or state of lacking a definite form or structure.
meanings.sent1: The artist captured the shapelessness of the clouds in his painting.
meanings.sent2: The shapelessness of the dough made it difficult to mold into a perfect circle.
meanings.sent3: The toddler's attempt at drawing resulted in a masterpiece of shapelessness.
meanings.sent4: In the fog, the landscape took on a mysterious shapelessness.
meanings.sent5: The shapelessness of the jello wobbling on the plate was mesmerizing.

meanings.definition: The condition of being without a distinct shape or outline.
meanings.sent1: The shapelessness of the shadow made it hard to identify the object casting it.
meanings.sent2: The shapelessness of the blob of paint on the canvas puzzled the art critics.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick involved transforming a solid object into shapelessness.
meanings.sent4: The shapelessness of the mist enveloped the entire forest.
meanings.sent5: The shapelessness of the clay allowed the sculptor to create abstract art.
